api_key.description: authentication header should be in header
api_key.name: access_token

methods.description: Get product details by providing the product IDs
Search for similar products by providing a link to any e-commerce product.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL must be a url encoded value

parameters.name: providers
parameters.description: A valid e commerce website link(eg. www.flipkart.com or http://www.amazon.in) by a ',' seperated values to filter response by required e-commerce providers

methods.description: Search for similar products by providing a link to any e-commerce product.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL must be a url encoded value

parameters.name: providers
parameters.description: A valid e commerce website link(eg. www.flipkart.com or http://www.amazon.in) by a ',' seperated values to filter response by required e-commerce providers

methods.description: Search for any product using title

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: search terms giving any title of products that are sold online
